info.title: Police Officers Club API
info.description: API for the Police Officers Club mobile application supporting authentication, member management, chalet booking, swimming pool reservations, and payment processing

tags.name: Swimming Pools
tags.description: Swimming pool management, availability, and booking

post.summary: Login with Phone Number / Resend OTP
post.description: Send OTP to phone number. If called again with the same phone number, it will resend the OTP code.

200.description: OTP sent successfully (or resent if called again)

429.description: Rate limit exceeded - too many OTP requests

post.summary: Verify OTP Code and Complete Authentication
post.description: Verify the OTP code sent to user's phone number and return authentication tokens with membership status

200.description: OTP verified successfully and authentication completed

post.description: Register a new member if they are not already a member

400.description: Invalid registration data or user already a member

get.description: Check if the authenticated member has an active subscription and return subscription details

post.description: Create a new subscription for a member with embedded invoice for payment

400.description: Invalid subscription data or user already has active subscription

get.description: Get list of available subscription options with pricing and details
Get paginated list of chalets with detailed information including amenities, pricing, and dynamic content

get.summary: Get Available Time Slots for Chalet
get.description: Get available time slots for a specific chalet with pricing information

parameters.name: chaletId
parameters.description: Chalet ID to get available slots for

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date to check availability from (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date to check availability to (YYYY-MM-DD)

post.description: Create a chalet reservation using item ID and slot ID with embedded invoice for payment

400.description: Invalid booking data or chalet not available

403.description: User is not a member with active subscription

get.description: Get paginated list of swimming pools with detailed information including amenities, pricing, and dynamic content

get.summary: Get Available Time Slots for Swimming Pool
get.description: Get available time slots for a specific swimming pool with pricing information

parameters.name: poolId
parameters.description: Swimming pool ID to get available slots for

post.description: Create a swimming pool reservation with embedded invoice for payment

201.description: Swimming pool booked successfully with invoice

400.description: Invalid booking data or time slot not available

403.description: User is not a member with active subscription

post.description: Process payment for an invoice using KNET or other payment methods

400.description: Invalid payment data or invoice not found

get.description: Check if payment was successful for a specific invoice ID

parameters.name: invoiceId
parameters.description: Invoice ID to check payment status for

post.summary: Check User State by Phone Number
post.description: Checks if the user is a member and/or subscriber by phone number. Used on app open.

post.summary: Check User State by National ID
post.description: Checks if the user is a member and/or subscriber by national ID. Used on app open.
